name: places/ChIJL0QlTbhZwokRJuRWi3i1MOA
formattedAddress: 25 W 14th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 25 W 14th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
Charles is hands down the best trainer I’ve ever had. He has worked with me for over two years now to help me to get a handle on a bad back and deal with a lifetime of physical neglect. “Coop” understands so well how best to help people with injuries and has motivated me to become fit and happy with my body for the first time in my life. And he did it all over Zoom!

Although it was not my primary  goal, all the work we have done together has helped me to lose nearly 50 pounds and drop three dress sizes.  I am forever grateful for Coop’s expertise and good humor and look forward to continued workouts so I can keep getting stronger!

originalText.text: Charles is the most knowledgeable and experienced trainer I have worked with. His programming is as personalized and thoughtful as it gets, and he is extremely invested in the results for his clients.

text.text: Charles is the most knowledgeable and experienced trainer I have worked with. His programming is as personalized and thoughtful as it gets, and he is extremely invested in the results for his clients.

originalText.text: Charles is an extraordinary fitness expert - incredibly knowledgeable, professional and talented in his field. Would give him 6 stars if I could!

text.text: Charles is an extraordinary fitness expert - incredibly knowledgeable, professional and talented in his field. Would give him 6 stars if I could!

originalText.text:
Charles is by far the best trainer I’ve worked with. He understands the body like no one I’ve worked with before. I have multiple injuries and previously, always started working out, and then had to stop from pain. With Charles, he was not only able to help heal my injuries, but I also saw major results. He was able to get me toned, adding muscle/strength to the targeted areas. He was a master at reading where my body was at during each session, and trained me accordingly. He was super focused and  specific which I appreciated. And followed up on my nutrition regularly throughout the week.

I can’t recommend him enough. He deeply cares about his clients and is fun to be with, which is such a plus for me.

text.text:

I have multiple injuries and previously, always started working out, and then had to stop from pain. With Charles, he was not only able to help heal my injuries, but I also saw major results. He was able to get me toned, adding muscle/strength to the targeted areas. He was a master at reading where my body was at during each session, and trained me accordingly. He was super focused and  specific which I appreciated. And followed up on my nutrition regularly throughout the week.

I can’t recommend him enough. He deeply cares about his clients and is fun to be with, which is such a plus for me.

originalText.text: For the first time, I can honestly say I’m  confident and comfortable with my physical trainer, Charles Cooperman. Since having back surgery ( a double fusion ) in 2006, I’ve never been satisfied with any other trainer. Charles is careful when working with me. He clearly knows what I am capable of achieving while also knowing my limitations, so I don’t injure myself during workout routines to strengthen my core.  He is professional, yet has a very humorous side which is entertaining and makes you feel comfortable. He’s an outstanding trainer and very flexible with accommodating my difficult schedule. I highly recommend him.
